document_data.name: Quynn Goldengrove
document_data.mainbody: '''Quynn Goldengrove''' was a prince of the [[Suldusk]] tribes of [[wild elves]] in the [[Forest of Tethir]] who married a [[half-elf]] woman from [[Clan Ithal]].
document_data.Relationships: Prince Quynn married [[Varytha Ithal]], the daughter of [[human]] chieftain [[Corin Ithal]] and this elven wife [[Shyllisyrr Ithal]].
document_data.History: In {{Yearlink|-189}}, Shyllisyrr's accidental death lead to fragile relations between the [[Tethyrian]] clans the tribes of the Forest of Tethir, which lasted for over a decade. Quynn's decision to marry a woman from Clan Ithal played an important role in easing tensions between the two peoples and restoring peace.
